details.arabic_diacless: ربناۤ اٰمنا بماۤ انزلت واتبعنا الرسول فاكتبنا مع الشٰهدين
details.arabic: رَبَّنَاۤ اٰمَنَّا بِمَاۤ اَنۡزَلۡتَ وَاتَّبَعۡنَا الرَّسُوۡلَ فَاكۡتُبۡنَا مَعَ الشّٰهِدِيۡنَ
details.transliteration: Rabbana amanna bima anzalta wattaba 'nar-Rusula fak-tubna ma'ash-Shahideen
details.translations: Our Lord, we have believed in what You revealed and have followed the messenger Jesus, so register us among the witnesses [to truth].
